entry.title: Die Your Daughter
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,048Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: A call lost in the dark, a plea swallowed by silence.A father’s hands hold only shadows — fragile, cold, and slipping away.Stiles is gone, vanished into the void where light once lived.Derek’s grief burns like a quiet flame, fierce and unrelenting.In the spaces between moments, sorrow lingers — thick and unending, a weight that crushes the soul.Love becomes a ghost, haunting empty rooms and broken hearts.When the world falls away, all that remains is the ache of what was never saved.

entry.title: Nothing Like Losing a Limb
entry.summary:
Author: ash_mcj

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,668Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 902

Summary: Once the smoke dissipated after the tragedy at Hale Manor, the survivors of the once-thriving pack were scattered like ash in the wind. For some, the next two years passed like a suffocating gust of wind, pinning them to the burning embers they could never quite heal from. For others, it dragged on slowly, allowing their scars to fade as they watched the grass on their scorched life regrow. Though, one thing was for certain: none of them came out of the flames unscathed.[or: derek self-destructs, allison finds strength and guidance in the side of her bloodline she’d never thought to explore, cora learns to survive in treacherous conditions, jackson attempts to function without his other half, and the stilinskis try so hard not to completely crumble that they inadvertently build themselves a new pack to protect the hale territory]

entry.title: I desire violently, and I wait
entry.summary:
Author: shona22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,179Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 267

Summary: “Because, Stiles.” He hesitated, testing the words on his tongue before finally speaking. “You’re a kid. You don’t know what you want.”That particular ugly expression – of something hurt, displeased– flashes across the boy's features again. “And you chose this child, so–”“Give me a break,” Derek snapped, standing abruptly. “You think I chose this? You think I had a say in what my wolf did? You think I would ever choose a child? Choose you?”__Wolves mate – and the fairytales make it sound so easy. But Derek’s wolf chose Stiles long ago, and he’s spent every day since pretending it didn’t. He never acted on it. Refused to. That had been the line. He’s not... a monster.But now he’s back, thrust into being an alpha with blood on his hands and a pack on his shoulders, he can’t keep the hunger at bay. It slips through his claws, ends up on bruised skin, and the way he watches Stiles like he’s already his.Maybe he has always been the monster the hunters whispered about.

entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,637Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: Echoes and Whispers of the Past
entry.summary:
Author: Tarlos_ASB9

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 435Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Betrayed, abandoned, and discarded — Percy Jackson walks away from the only world he's ever known, leaving behind Olympus and Camp Half-Blood after realizing loyalty doesn't always run both ways. Across the country, Stiles Stilinski is equally done. With the guilt, the blame, the so-called friends who never really saw her, and the crushing grief of losing her mom, she packs up and disappears.Neither of them expected anything good to come from walking away… but fate has other plans.Seven years later, Percy and Stiles are living a quiet life — not hiding, not running, just living. With kids, love, and healing stitched into the fabric of their everyday, it almost feels too good to be true. And maybe it is… because when gods show up on Percy’s doorstep, and people who were supposed to be dead start showing up alive on Stiles’s radar, their pasts come crashing into their present.They knew peace couldn't last forever. But they’ll be damned if anyone takes away what they’ve built — especially not the people who once left them behind.

entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,956Chapters: 9/29Kudos: 87

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: FAIL WITH CONSEQUENCE (TWAT)
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,708Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 48

Summary: When Stiles undoes Scott’s werewolf bite, everything changes. Powerless and immune to the supernatural, Scott falls from the center to the fringe watching as Stiles becomes something… More. More than the boy who used to orbit someone else’s story, stepping into a role no one had a name for. Was it truly the path to becoming a True Alpha that made Scott a hero or had seeing himself as Beacon Hills paragon only amplified the illusion? *inspired by failcat's AU twitter post wherein Scott becomes human again learns he's a twat but really he learns nothing and continues to be a twat.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,698Chapters: 14/75Kudos: 21

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.
